messages.ASE_SSLIssueRecommendation: To use a certificate in App Service, the certificate must be signed by a trusted certificate authority. If your web app gives you certificate validation errors, you're probably using a self-signed certificate and to resolve them you need to set a variable named VSTS_ARM_REST_IGNORE_SSL_ERRORS to the value true in the build or release definition
